title: Unhealthy is unhealthy
body:
9 letter word count is very odd. Overuse of the word carries detrimental effects such as eye rolling, anger, nicememe etc. The word reads and sounds _unhealthy_. By reflexive property of mathemagics, unhealthy = unhealthy.

For people who use this word, they don't even consider healthier alternatives such as _injurious, deleterious, insalubrious, or malignant_.
Literally unplayable!

I am actually glad that this word is just an unimaginative negation of the word healthy, or else it might just have a positive connotation.

replies.body: Alright, this meme is dead. Stop beating it.
